snippet: A New Jersey man, who the authorities say kidnapped his two young boys after stabbing their mother to death, was arrested in South Carolina.
abstract: John Jordan of New Jersey, who authorities say kidnapped his two young boys after stabbing their mother Tracy, his estranged wife, to death at her home in Lodi, is arrested in South Carolina.

byline.original: By NATE SCHWEBER and MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ
byline.contributor: Nate Schweber reported from Lodi, N.J., and Michael Schwirtz from New York. Ashley Southall contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: A New Jersey man, who the authorities say kidnapped his two young boys after stabbing their mother to death, was arrested in South Carolina.

headline.main: Man Is Arrested in Killing of His Wife; Sons Are Found Safe
headline.print_headline: Sons Are Found Safe After Father Is Arrested in the Killing of His Wife
